## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works

### Security
- [ ] My changes include input validation
- [ ] I've checked for potential security vulnerabilities
- [ ] Sensitive data is properly handled

### Performance
- [ ] I have performed performance testing
- [ ] Database queries are optimized
- [ ] Proper async/await usage where applicable

### Dependencies
- [ ] Any dependencies I've added are necessary
- [ ] I've updated relevant documentation about new dependencies
- [ ] Dependencies are properly scoped
